entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
